thread.title: The best home cinema deals – 4K Blu-ray players, AV receivers and more
thread.title_full: The best home cinema deals – 4K Blu-ray players, AV receivers and more

author: Anonymous
title: The best home cinema deals – 4K Blu-ray players, AV receivers and more
text:
21st February 2017 by Joe Cox Follow @@JosephCox Looking to upgrade your home cinema system, or want to get the best prices on kit before you take your first steps? You're in the right place. 
We've rounded-up the best home cinema savings on some of our favourite 4K Blu-ray players, home cinema amplifiers, projectors and speaker packages. 
There are deals on AV products from Panasonic, Pioneer, Sony, Yamaha and Tannoy.
